context_bundle.summary: Connection strings by DB type, SQL injection prevention (sanitize or stored procs), transactions (BEGIN/COMMIT/ROLLBACK in On Block Error), batch inserts (single INSERT with VALUES list), pagination (OFFSET-FETCH/LIMIT), connection pooling params

onboarding.quick_start: SQL Server: Server=x;Database=y;User Id=u;Password=p; | MySQL: Server=x;Database=y;Uid=u;Pwd=p; | Open once, reuse, close at end
common_patterns: Transaction: BEGIN TRAN -> [ops] -> COMMIT (or ROLLBACK in error handler)
Batch insert: INSERT INTO T VALUES (a,b),(c,d),(e,f) - single roundtrip
Pagination: SELECT * ORDER BY id OFFSET @skip ROWS FETCH NEXT @take ROWS ONLY
known_errors: SQL injection: Replace ' with '' in inputs, or use stored procs
PAD Execute SQL returns FIRST result set only from multi-result procs
Open connection once, not per query in loop (massive perf hit)
Connection timeout default 15s - increase for slow networks
